structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.text: The occupant shall have a lien upon the land recovered from him to satisfy the judgment, and may enforce it by suit in equity, order of court, or other procedure.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3737.
